cast.overview: After he and his first wife separate, journalist David Sheff struggles to help their teenage son, who goes from experimenting with drugs to becoming devastatingly addicted to methamphetamine.
cast.title: Beautiful Boy

details.biography:
Justin Townes Earle (January 4, 1982 – August 23, 2020) was an American singer-songwriter and musician. He was a son of alternative country artist Steve Earle and was partly named after Townes Van Zandt.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Justin Townes Earle, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Justin Townes Earle
